sources.title: Paratroop Padre (TV-1957) DONALD WOODS
sources.description:
The GOLDEN AGE of TELEVISION: This episode, originally from season 2 of the anthology series Crossroads, was first broadcast by ABC in 2 parts on May 29, 1957 and April 5, 1957. Restored and edited by PizzaFLIX with recreated titles.

Stars: Donald Woods, Charles McGraw, Richard Jaeckel
Director: Justus Addiss

The true story of Father Francis L. Sampson, the most decorated chaplain of WWII. Follow his journey as a volunteer paratrooper at Fort Benning to parachuting into Normandy on D-Day, protected only with his devotion to God and his uncompromising faith.
